title: Write an Executive Summary
description: An agent must write a one-page executive summary of a 50-page detailed analysis report.

tasks.description: Analyze the full report to understand the problem statement, key findings, and final recommendations.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent correctly grasps the core message of the entire document.

tasks.description: Draft the executive summary, ensuring it is concise and covers all critical elements.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent generates a well-written summary that is approximately one page long.
